official_title: A bill to strengthen the program for grants to States for dependent care programs, and for other purposes.
short_title: State Dependent Care Grants Amendments Act of 1987
subjects: Federal aid to day care centers

summary.text: State Dependent Care Grants Amendments Act of 1987 - Amends the State Dependent Care Development Grants Act to require that amounts paid to States for use in the operation of child care services be designed to enable children whose families lack adequate financial resources to participate in before or after school child care programs. Requires State Governors to include specified information in their grant reports. Extends from September 30, 1987, to September 30, 1991, the time until which necessary revisions of grant program descriptions must be submitted.

titles.title: State Dependent Care Grants Amendments Act of 1987
A bill to strengthen the program for grants to States for dependent care programs, and for other purposes.
